name: Sushi Mania
description:
Starting as an apprentice in Hattori Hanzō’s kitchen, master the art of slicing sushi to the awe and satisfaction of Hanzo’s loyal clientele.

Left-click and hold as your slice through delicious meat, but be careful not to slice the wrong animal, as sushi is served immediately raw and Hanzo has a strict “no food goes to waste” policy.

Code by: Jonas Billeskov and Jorge Galvao
Art by: Michael Chiniquy and Yasin Jensen
Sound by: Yasin Jensen

Source code available on Github
